name: A Case Of The Mondays
description:
Made for GIAW - Game In A Week #2 (1st April 2018 - 8th April 2018)                                Theme: EVERYONE IS DEAD!

Run around to lick the salary men to brighten their Monday mornings and replenish their life force which has been sucked into corporate purgatory.

Controls:

WASD to move

Space for speed boost (boost is on cooldown timer)

Twitter: https://twitter.com/AndyBone10
